    • addBothStates

      public void addBothStates(String fromS, String toS, boolean isEnd)
      Adds the both states of a transition.
      Parameters:
      fromS - - initial State of the transition
      toS - - end State of a transition
      isEnd - - flag to know if to State belongs to the end States

    • addRoleParticipant

      public void addRoleParticipant(String p, boolean isDeploy) throws exceptions.CustomException
      Adds the associations between role and participant. The participant parameter can contain multiple participants, hence the split by [|]. Since this method only manages general associations, we only need to treat new participants.
      Parameters:
      p - - participant
      isDeploy - - flag to know if the method is called in the deploy action
      Throws:
      exceptions.CustomException - - custom exception, the deploy action only accepts new Participants

    • addGlobalVars

      public void addGlobalVars(List<ast.ASTVar> globalVars, Map<String,types.IType> localVars) throws exceptions.CustomException
      Adds the global variables. Checks if the variable's IDs are unique among them and the parameters.
      Parameters:
      globalVars - - global variables
      localVars - - local variables
      Throws:
      exceptions.CustomException - - custom exception, variables have unique IDS between each other and also between the parameters IDS
